{"step_by_step_thinking": "Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) is known to cause several types of cancers. Carcinoma base of tongue, cervical carcinoma, and tonsillar carcinoma are all associated with HPV infection. However, nasopharyngeal carcinoma is typically associated with Epstein-Barr virus (EBV), not HPV.", "answer_choice": "D"}
